data.description: Load, manipulate, save Windows raster fonts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
With Font::FNT, you can load, manipulate and save Windows raster
    fonts (.FNT files). It is possible to

    - create a Font::FNT instance from a .FNT file - save a Font::FNT
    instance into a .FNT file - save a Font::FNT instance into a
    notepadable format (YAML) - create a Font::FNT instance from a YAML
    file - save a Font::FNT instance into a portable bitmap (for preview
    purposes)
